title: Blaster

fields.name: Abilites:
fields.value: - Destroy someone's house with a burst of lava.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only target non-doused players.
- Visitors to your target's house will learn your name, even if your target is protected.
- You have two attacks.
- If the Apocalypse dies, you will graduate to the Apocalypse. You have priority for graduation.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You were burned away by the Blaster!"
"They were burned to cinders by the Blaster."

desc:
Post 371
*Ashes to ashes, dust to dust...*
Conversion Immune
